alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Portage, northern Winnebago, Waushara, southern Waupaca and southwestern Outagamie Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Amherst to 9 miles west of Hartman Creek State Park to Plainfield to Dellwood. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Plainfield around 715 PM CDT. Amherst around 720 PM CDT. Hartman Creek State Park around 725 PM CDT. Chain O` Lakes-King around 730 PM CDT. Napowan Scout Camp around 735 PM CDT. Waupaca around 740 PM CDT. Fremont around 750 PM CDT. Lake Poygan around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Butte Des Morts, Mackville, Larsen, Northport, Orihula, Borth, Winneconne, Zittau, Harbor Springs and Medina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
